roleset.name: to spend frivolously
roleset.note: FRITTER_AWAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fritter' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from fritter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Over the last few weeks , he has frittered away roughly half of what [*T*-1] was once a 33-point lead in the polls over Mr. Giuliani .
example.arg: roughly half of what [*T*-1] was once a 33-point lead in the polls over Mr. Giuliani
